name: Ranch
description: A large agricultural operation focused on livestock provides meat, leather, and other animal products. The vast land holdings create wealth and influence, while the remote location requires self-sufficiency and defense against rustlers.
atmosphere: Cattle low across vast pastures while horses' hooves thunder over rolling hills. The air carries the rich scent of leather, livestock, and the promise of agricultural wealth. Every horizon stretches with the promise of vast land holdings. Your skin feels the wind across open spaces and the weight of agricultural responsibility. The taste of beef and leather fills your mouth.
